title: “What’s good for the country isn’t always optimal for your companies.” Sam Altman and Elon Musk publicly clash over the Stargate AI project

content:

title: New MIT Chip Design Slashes Energy Waste and Boosts AI Speed
description: Researchers at MIT have developed a new computer chip fabrication method that integrates logic and memory devices to drastically improve energy efficiency, offering a critical solution to the ballooning energy consumption of Artificial Intelligence.

title: McMahon rips Walz for allowing students to game applications
description: The Education Department has explained that these fraudsters can pose as students through the use of artificial intelligence bots.

title: New AI tool speeds up discovery of life-supporting microbes in microalgae
description: Scientists at NYU Abu Dhabi have developed a powerful new artificial intelligence tool called LA⁴SR that can rapidly identify previously overlooked proteins in microalgae—tiny organisms that produce much of Earth's oxygen and support entire aquatic ecosystems.

title: AI might not be the biggest risk for investors in 2026

title: How Artificial Intelligence Can Take Your Career Further
description: Artificial Intelligence is no longer a futuristic concept reserved for researchers and Silicon Valley labs. In 2025, AI is everywhere—quietly reshaping how businesses operate, how doctors diagnose patients, how creators design content, and how decisions are made at scale. title: AI-generated robbery hoax prompts major police response in Elyria; employees charged
description: Two employees of a local deli are facing criminal charges after police say they fabricated a robbery report using artificial intelligence that prompted a full police response Monday morning.
content:

title: Will OpenAI be the next tech giant or next Netscape?
description: Three years after ChatGPT made OpenAI the leader in artificial intelligence and a household name, rivals have closed the gap and some investors are wondering if the sensation has the wherewithal to stay dominant.
